items.text: hits him high on the bat as he defends back towards the bowler.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Change in bowling, Brandon Mavuta with his legspin. Fourth ODI for him, has picked four wickets so far.
items.text: starts well. Lands this on a length, just around middle, defended with soft hands.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: drops short, he rocks back and pulls all along the ground to deep square leg.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: tossed up, invites the drive by pitching it on off stump. Driven with the spin to mid-off.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: nurdled with the spin to square leg.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: turns this gently into the square leg region for an easy single.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: slips this down leg, the keeper can't gather cleanly and they'll scamper a bye in addition to the wide
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, 2 wides

items.text: leading edge, but doesn't carry to the bowler. Mushfiq was looking to work this through midwicket
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: banged in short, excellent bouncer on middle, Imrul shapes to pull but bails out at the last moment. Excellent decision too.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: slower length ball outside off, steers this straight to backward point.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: lifter from a length on middle and off, Imrul takes a step across to defend but gets a thick inside edge towards square leg.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: well-controlled work off his wrists to square leg. Kept it all along the ground.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: slower, fuller and belted away! Once again, picked this off his hand immediately and decided to straight downtown. Superb timing, aesthetically pleasing and result extremely satisfying. Superb from Imrul
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: thick outside edge to third man as he tries to work this to the leg side. Closed the bat face a little too early in trying to work this towards midwicket
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: skids one through on a length but outside leg, may have brushed the thigh pad as he tried to tickle fine.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: gets outside the line of the stumps and smothers this tossed up delivery.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: driven back hard, but well stopped by the bowler in his followthrough
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: beaten by the fizz, attempted googly but not much turn. He rocked back to cut but couldn't connect
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: too much width outside off, length way too short as well. Slapped away to deep point.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: big appeal for caught behind but umpire Dharmasena is confident in saying not out. Zimbabwe have reviewed.
items.text: this is a short ball drifting in towards leg stump, Mushfiqur looks to pull, plays too early and in doing so has got some glove on this. Excellent grab down the leg side by the wicketkeeper, who may have been blinded just a touch. But his balance was superb as he made a swift move to complete the catch. Dharmasena's decision overturned and Bangladesh are wobbling.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mushfiqur Rahim, OUT

dismissal.text: Mushfiqur Rahim c †Taylor b Mavuta 15 (20b 1x4 0x6) SR: 75.00

items.text: stands tall and punches to deep point
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: skiddy short of length delivery on the stumps, defended back.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full on off, hint of movement away, defended into the off side with soft hands.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: gets half a stride in to stab this length delivery on off stump.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: punched but can't pierce the packed off-side ring. The cover fielder puts his left hand out to stop that.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mohammad Mithun, no run
